text: Pedro Cuatrecasas (born 27 September 1936) is an Spanish-born American biochemist. He is an Adjunct Professor of Pharmacology & Medicine at the University of California, San Diego. Cuatrecasas was born in Madrid, Spain. In 1982, he was elected the National Academy of Sciences. In 1987, Cuatrecasas won the Wolf Prize in Medicine in 1987. ==References== Category:Wolf Prize winners Category:1936 births Category:Living people Category:Spanish scientists Category:American biochemists Category:People from Madrid Category:Naturalized citizens of the United States
title: Pedro Cuatrecasas
